about_the_game:
Keep on, ‘cause the Force don't stop! The Franchise only gets better with three new outfits. “Rod The Bounty Hunter” sheds his sleeves and takes it to the streets. Hardtack is a real dreamboat in his dinner dress. Fortune flies high in steam-driven style. Collect ‘em all!

Content included:


  • Hollywood Geo-Skin
  • Hardtack Geo-Skin
  • Fortune Geo-Skin
detailed_description:
Keep on, ‘cause the Force don't stop! The Franchise only gets better with three new outfits. “Rod The Bounty Hunter” sheds his sleeves and takes it to the streets. Hardtack is a real dreamboat in his dinner dress. Fortune flies high in steam-driven style. Collect ‘em all!

Content included:


  • Hollywood Geo-Skin
  • Hardtack Geo-Skin
  • Fortune Geo-Skin

name: Agents of Mayhem - Franchise Force Skins Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 or above / or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or above / or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 38 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K or above / or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 12288 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or above / or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 38 MB available space

short_description: Keep on, ‘cause the Force don't stop! The Franchise only gets better with three new outfits. “Rod The Bounty Hunter” sheds his sleeves and takes it to the streets. Hardtack is a real dreamboat in his dinner dress. Fortune flies high in steam-driven style. Collect ‘em all!
